A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: What did I just see?! I'm shocked by the high critic score. This movie ead on arrival and I can't put into words how disappointed  I was. I've read about twists and turns\, innovation\, surprises. This movie had none. It's a mishmash of its predecessors and not in a good way. Even the better scenes are missing soul. The script is lazy. The escapes are nonsensical. And our beloved characters from the originals are all wrong.
